ing: 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
n: Bourbon and Brown Sugar Barbeque Sauce
des: "Great barbecue sauce for pulled pork or chicken. Glazes nicely on the grill."
ins: Combine ketchup, tomato sauce, bourbon, brown sugar, molasses, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, soy sauce, onion powder, garlic powder, black pepper, mustard powder, liquid smoke, and cayenne pepper in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring often, until sauce is reduced and smooth, about 45 minutes.
